issue.title: [Website] Populate hard-coded fields for current release from a YAML file
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1872](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1872). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Jekyll supports interpolating data from YAML files when generating the static site. This will simplify updating the website by not having to edit hard-coded fields in Markdown or HTML files
